revised_title: The Effect of Various Substances on Cobra Poison: A Study on Antidotes
tldr: This study investigates the effectiveness of various substances, such as perchloride of platinum, chloride of gold, and permanganate of potash, in neutralizing the activity of cobra poison. The authors find that while these substances can render the poison inert, they do not prevent its absorption into the bloodstream and ultimately do not save the animal from death when injected with a lethal dose of the poison.
